mapper.select:
SELECT c.channel_no channelNo, c.pv pv, d.nv nv, c.uv uv FROM ( SELECT a.channel_no, SUM(a.pv) pv, COUNT(DISTINCT a.mac) uv FROM statistics.channel_visit_summary_district a WHERE 1=1 AND a.begin_time >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND a.end_time <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${startTime+span},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY a.channel_no ) c, ( SELECT COUNT(mac) nv, channel_no FROM statistics.channel_visit_summary_district a WHERE a.mac NOT IN ( SELECT b.mac FROM statistics.new_visitor b ) AND a.begin_time >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND a.end_time <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${startTime+span},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY a.channel_no ) d WHERE c.channel_no = d.channel_no
AND c.channel_no = #{channelNo}

SELECT channel ,mac,MAX(`timestamp`) timeStamp,`session` FROM `api_logs_shfctv_01` WHERE `timestamp` <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND `timestamp` >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY mac,`session` ORDER BY `timestamp` desc
/* SELECT channel ,mac,MAX(`timestamp`) timeStamp,`session` FROM `api_logs_shfctv_01` WHERE `timestamp` >= '2017-03-14 00:00:00' AND `timestamp` <= '2017-03-14 01:00:00' GROUP BY mac,`session` ORDER BY `timestamp` desc;*/

SELECT log_id logId,channel,mac,`timestamp` timeStamp,session FROM api_logs_shfctv_01 WHERE session = #{log.session} AND timestamp < #{log.timeStamp} AND timestamp > DATE_ADD(#{log.timeStamp}, INTERVAL -2 HOUR)

SELECT count(log_id) from api_logs_shfctv_01 WHERE channel = #{log.channel} AND `timestamp` <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND `timestamp` >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT count(DISTINCT mac) from api_logs_shfctv_01 WHERE channel = #{log.channel} AND `timestamp` <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND `timestamp` >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT mac FROM `api_logs_shfctv_01` WHERE channel = #{log.channel} AND `timestamp` <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND `timestamp` >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND mac NOT IN (SELECT mac FROM new_visitor) GROUP BY mac

SELECT log_id logId,channel,mac,`timestamp` timeStamp,session FROM api_logs_shfctv_01 WHERE timestamp > #{log.timestamp} AND mac = #{log.mac} and channel = #{log.channle} AND session = #{log.session} ORDER BY `timestamp` DESC
SELECT block_id from mac_info WHERE mac = #{log.mac}
select residence_id from mac_info WHERE mac = #{log.mac}

SELECT log_id logId, channel, mac, min(`timestamp`) TIMESTAMP, SESSION FROM api_logs_shfctv_01 WHERE TIMESTAMP < #{log.timeStamp} AND `timestamp` > FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND mac = #{log.mac} AND channel = #{log.channel} AND session = #{log.session}
